title: Plugging in $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: $$(-2,4)$$ is a solution because both equations are true when $$x=-2$$ and $$y=4$$ are plugged in.\n##figure1.gif##
speech: times, parentheses, negative 2 comma 4,   is a solution because both equations are true when  x is equal to, negative 2  and  y, is equal to 4  are plugged in.\n##figure1.gif##
